discourse_list.title: Digest #47: Unicef Round Final Results \xf0\x9f\xa4\x9d Happy Holidays! \xe2\x9d\x84\xef\xb8\x8f

content.content: 1442×260 92.3 KB  Digest #47: Unicef Round Final Results Happy Holidays!   Hi–if you are reading this, we want to know more about you! Please take a couple minutes to fill out this survey, so that we can continue to improve the Gitcoin Digest    Screen Shot 2022-12-21 at 7.03.49 PM2396×1226 76.2 KB   The Final Results Are In!   The Unicef Alpha Round ended yesterday, with a grand total of ~$97k in donations, from 15,507 unique donors. Thank you to all who donated, as well as those who promoted the round, and those at Gitcoin who worked to make this grants round a reality! See the final results here. P.S. We are aware of an issue with the grants protocol in which the Unicef Round ended some hours earlier than expected. This is the first of five Alpha Test rounds, and we appreciate your understanding.    In This Issue of the Digest This week’s Digest is a bit shorter than usual, as we head into the Winter holidays. There will be no Digest next week, but we will continue shipping in the new year!  DAO News   Upcoming Events   Opportunities for Builders       DAO News   The new Schelling Point website is up! Schelling Point happens on March 2nd–during ETH Denver(Feb. 24 to March 5th)–and is still accepting applications from speakers. This year’s conference is titled, “The Joy of Collective Thriving: An Unconference For Planetary Wellbeing & Flourishing”. Apply here to be a speaker and snag your early bird ticket while there’s still time!    The recording is up from last week’s Community Call, “Future of the Gitcoin Grants Program: Part II”. Listen here.   The Fantom Round runs on the grants protocol until Jan. 2nd. Donate, vote, and share to help your favorite Fantom projects receive matching funds. Have a look at the 85 grantee projects, and vote/donate to those you’d like to support! See the round here.    Buidl in Public #5 happened Tuesday this week. Expect more of these in the coming year!      Upcoming Community Events That’s a wrap on events for 2022. See you in the new year! For up-to-the-minute updates on Gitcoin events, check out our Events Calendar!    Opportunities for Builders   The Web3 Social Hackathon runs until 12/31. Sponsors include Gitcoin, Ceramic, Unlock, and others. $50k in prizes. Register now.    Algorand Greenhouse Hack 3. Began this 12/21 and runs until Feb. 8th, 2023. Various bounties available. Take a look at the winning projects from GHH2.      New to GitcoinDAO?    TLDR - What is Gitcoin?   Become a Gitcoin Citizen!    Sign up here to get the Gitcoin Digest in your inbox. Tell us how we can improve the Digest here!   Previous edition

周报#47中文版，欢迎订阅并关注中文twtitter（@GitcoinCN）参与互动！   news.gitcoinchina.com    GitcoinDAO 周报 #47 2022 最终结果出来了！联合国儿童基金会Alpha轮募捐昨天结束，来自 15,507 名独立捐助者的捐款总额约为 97,000 美元。感谢所有捐赠者，以及推动这一轮的人，以及 Gitcoin 的那些努力使这一轮赠款成为现实的人！在这里查看最终结果 .PS 我们知道赠款协议存在一个问题，即 Unicef 回合比预期提前几个小时结束。这是五轮 Alpha...      中文周报订阅：http ://news.gitcoinchina.com/
